summary:
Simply removes essential status from NPCs

WARNING: This lets you kill anything and everything.  It can, and will, ruin questlines and make your game unprogressable.  You have been warned.
descriptionHtml:
This mod removes the essential status from any NPC that has it.  That includes quest NPCs, misc NPCs, and anything else you can think of.  It can easily ruin a quest line, so use it sparringly!

A feature I want in the future is for a message to pop up upon killing an NPC that will affect a quest line, similar to Morrowind, saying \"The Thread of Prophecy is Severed.\"  If anyone knows how to script this in, PM me here or on reddit (WaterChestnut3).

Enjoy!
author: Buttrknife
